channel.title: The coding chef
channel.description: Recent content on The coding chef

item.title: A shy person goes to a conference (C3)
item.description: Going to a conference (or festival in this case) alone is common. The prerequisites are: have the available budget, time and interest. Easy enough for most people. BUT WAIT … YOU’RE AN INTROVERT. Well good news is, friend, that’s even better! Here are a few /unstuck commands I found useful to send to my brain when attempting this feat for the first time joining C3 Festival 2024. Hopefully there’s something in there for you too.
